subject: Sexual Harassment
Wages and Salaries
Suits and Litigation
Basketball
lead_paragraph: A man who worked for three years as Eddy Curry’s driver is suing Curry, alleging sexual harassment and a failure to pay him tens of thousands of dollars.
snippet: A man who worked for three years as Eddy Curry’s driver is suing Curry, alleging sexual harassment and a failure to pay him tens of thousands of dollars.
